text: Mont-Noble is a municipality of the district of Hérens in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011, the former municipalities of Mase, Nax and Vernamiège merged into the new municipality of Mont-Noble. ==Villages== Nax, Vernamiège and Mase. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:2011 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Hérens
title: Mont-Noble
